subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi said he was certain Derek Jeter would return to the Yankees as the same player he was before he injured his ankle. He just could not say when that return would be.
snippet: Joe Girardi said he was certain Derek Jeter would return to the Yankees as the same player he was before he injured his ankle. He just could not say when that return would be.
